issue.title: Filepath issue, possible Qt API issues

content.raw: Somewhat relatedly, had a bug recently where pandas 0.20.1 would import PyQt4 and set the API to version 1. Lyse of course was not happy about this. Pandas has since fixed it to make those imports optional. Didn't seem to happen on my system though, despite using the same version of pandas, but if anyone sees that, there's your explanation.
